Formbuilder User Guide
About

About

FormBuilder is a web application has been developed by the NHS Wales Informatics Service for Public Health Wales, primarily for the design and operation of the Clinical Governance and self-assessment of GP surgeries across Wales.

Formbuilder User Guide

  • Formbuilder User Guide

Formbuilder was created for Public Health Wales as a bespoke tool for creating forms for data collection questionaires and self-assessment. Reports can be created to present the data in a friendly format.
